column5: I found a Shimano CVS 66M and the reel is Shimano 2500FB for $100.00 if anyone wants it.
LMAO!!
yes back in the day thieves only had pawn shops to get rid of their loot now they have lots of options.
I just bought a truck off there last weekend love Kijiji I am always on there

similar experience to Lew...I posted my boat here a couple of years ago, after a month of no interest put it on Kijiji for more money (was willing to give OFC discount) and sold it within days!  Some people on Kijiji are pretty thick though. i advertised some Blizzak winter tires ON RIMS on Kijiji for like $20 each, telling people the tires had maybe a season left, basically selling the rims but you get the tires that are on it. You wouldn't believe the dummies calling and asking how new the tires were..year old? like new? Read the ad doorknobs, they're 20.00 each including the rim
Because you can get a St. Croix rod, Shimano Citica Reel and a Bill Dance Signature rod all for $60
Whaaaaaaat what kinda croix?
Premier
i am an avid kijiji shopper. i have gotten lots of really amazing deals on there.
same !
If you guys find a Sportspal, let me know
http://kitchener.kijiji.ca/c-cars-vehicles...QAdIdZ171474284  http://kitchener.kijiji.ca/c-cars-vehicles...QAdIdZ181398176
There was a Sportspal on there last week for something like 300 with trolling motor, battery and oars.
Weeds, that's the kind of deal I'm looking for, lol..  I just need a beater canoe that's stable and I can drop a crappy minn kota onto.
Splashhopper is the king of finding sportspals on Kijiji!
I'm sorry Bill but if I find a deal like that I'm buying it
I wouldn't blame you  ....but if you find it stolen, you know where it is!!

Lots of great deals... skeeter should buy this....  http://barrie.kijiji.ca/c-buy-and-sell-oth...QAdIdZ192263011  I should grab that full transom Sportspal for the next customer that wants a canoe loader for their airplane. I built two of them over the winter for guys in BC that bought brand new Sportspals from the mfg/dealer out there.

You got it Dan..  Got a 13' Sportspal... site unseen... for FIFTY BUCKS !... (Included two paddles, two foams seats, and some old bungee chords.)   It leaks a little,  about 2 quarts of water in 5 hours of fishing... i can handle that.  I also got a 32lb thrust trolling motor, battery for 140.  Had to buy the mount for the motor(new) for 37 bucks though  I took the canoe out for a test run within and hour of getting it....  Here is the feeeesh that christened my Kijiji Sportspal jewel in the rough      I also have an ad posted on kijiji... where I am looking to trade my service for 14-16 aluminum boat with motor and trailer. One hit so far... but the guys boat was junk ( see a Vega) and he wanted a Cadillac bathroom.  No worries...

I ended up geting my boat (Hydra-Sports Z255, 15'4", 74" beam) for a killer deal.  Ended up replacing carpet, hatches, bilge area cleanup, modded livewell and just putchased 2 new seats and pedestal seat off the BPS Classic Sale.  Love every inch of my boat.
I love Kijiji!  I bought my 2006 Ranger, and Trailblazer from there, and sold my Avalanche on there!

I've always had good luck selling stuff here in the OFC classifieds but I recentely had a set of nice wheels listed for sale but nobody was interested, so after leaving them posted here a month I listed them on Kijiji and sold them the next day for full asking price. I had a total of 5 differerent guys wanting them with-in 2 days.  That was my one & only experience with Kijiji, but it worked good for me.

Bill you get ten chances to win a new sportspal at the Salmon Spectacular...(i think they are only 12 footers though ) with the numbers of entrants dropping over the past years ...your chances only get better
When is the Salmon Spectacular and where?
Owen Sound  http://www.sydenhamsportsmen.com/derby/
Kijiji, is great as long as you can read and spell it right.  Sold alot on it, everything from the Mrs' wedding dress, kids toys, and left over hardwood flooring.
Love Kijiji. I have been selling my old video games lately on there. I must be maturing! It makes the wife happy, of course any money I get goes directly to fishing stuff.
I bought a bass boat on kijiji, already sent the $$ to nigeria, now im just waiting for the boat to be delivered. should arrive soon!   :D
I love kijiji i bought my son a set of taylor made golf clubs for $30
Im a avid mountain biker,I usally bike to the river by my house via my kijiji bike,its a $5000 mountain bike,got it for $700!!
